title: Trump, Republicans incite crowd before mob storms Capitol

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creationsâ€™ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

title_for_label: Trump, Republicans incite crowd before mob storms Capitol
description: Hours before right-wing insurgents stormed the Capitol building in Washington DC, Donald Trump and his allies held a rally urging supporters to ‘Stop the Seal’, despite there being no evidence of voter fraud.
description_for_label: Hours before right-wing insurgents stormed the Capitol building in Washington DC, Donald Trump and his allies held a rally urging supporters to ‘Stop the Seal’, despite there being no evidence of voter fraud.

images.caption: Image via the Washington Post YouTube channel
images.credit_line: Image via the Washington Post YouTube channel
images.alt_text: A still frame from a video fo Donald Trump standing before the capitol building on a stage, speaking at a rally, wearing a black coat and gloves, his orange face gleaming arrogantly
